```{r}
# Numeric; numbers; null value is NA
# Character; "..."
# Logical; TRUE or FALSE
# Vectors; list of related data that is all the same type
# NA; data type requests the absence of a value
# to print value: print()
# to check class of the var: class()
print("character")
print(30)
print('30')
```
